content.title: Enjoy your summer at a holiday home

content.textLeft:
Summer at a holiday home – long lie-ins, breakfast on the terrace, playing and/or reading in the garden, cosy barbecues in the evening… If that sounds like the relaxing and refreshing holiday of your dreams, why not rent a holiday house or apartment with Interhome for your summer holiday?

A holiday home is the perfect way to enjoy a break with the family. There are often plenty of entertainment options available, so the little ones won’t get bored and the parents can also relax from time to time! Maybe you are looking for peace and quiet in the beautiful French countryside, relax near the beach in fascinating Croatia, soak up the sun by a glistening pool at your own villa in Spain? The choice of destination and accommodation available with Interhome is extensive, with locations and type of property to suit everyone.  It could be a villa near the beach, a chalet in the mountains, farmhouse in the countryside, even a castle in an idyllic location.

Everyone’s idea of a Summer Break is different and Interhome has an extensive choice of unique and beautiful holiday properties to choose from.  Many are close to the beach or have wonderful swimming pools, others might be in amazing locations with stunning views. With so many properties to choose from, you are sure to find the perfect summer holiday home for you!  The most enjoyable part of a self-catering holiday is the freedom you can enjoy on your well-earned summer break – get up when you want, eat according to your own timetable and explore your chosen destination at your leisure.  What a relaxing way to spend those hazy, summer days, especially when you are holidaying with children. No need to stick to rigid hotel restaurant times, you and your family can enjoy the freedom of preparing your own meals and setting your own daily agenda. Discover the joys of shopping in local markets and sourcing interesting local produce, then maybe pop back to your apartment or villa and cook up a masterpiece on the barbecue?  Also, make the most of local restaurants and cafes to sample some of the regional cuisine, then wander back to your holiday home to relax with the family. Choice and flexibility is the key!

elements.title: Why choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it than in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, experience the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or indulge yourself in the luxury of a Spanish Villa. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online with us - it is quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: A stay in a holiday house or apartment offers so many advantages: spend your time exactly the way you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules and pace. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Kick back and enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your own holiday letting.
